## ErrorXBaseConfig type

Base configuration properties provided by error-x. Users extend this with their custom properties via ErrorXResolverConfig.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ErrorXBaseConfig = {
    namespace: string;
    docsPath?: string;
    uiMessage?: string;
};
```
